Entries.Rainy_Night_Maru: Where you able to accomplish much today, hun?#$e#I tried to fix up some things around the house... you know, just little stuff.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Sam: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}} called. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentGender}}}} said {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentGender}}}} misses me and also to tell you hi.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_Shane: I just got off the phone with {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JasName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}. They seem to be having a pretty good time without me.
Entries.Indoor_Night_Sebastian: #$c .5#I may be a reclusive {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Guy:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}}, but I'm always happy when you're around.$h#$e#Hi, @. Good to see you. It's comforting when you're around.$h
Entries.jobReturn_Penny: #$c .5#Good evening. My day was fine, thanks! How was yours?$h#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JasName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}} weren't behaving very well today. I'm still all wound up...
Entries.winter_Sebastian: I wonder what {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}'s up to? We used to be really good friends.
Entries.winter_Sam: I've given up on being a musician. I'm a family {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamGender}}}} now!
